# Make G-Calendar Visible {#sec-calendar}
1.	On left side find your calendar and hover to get the 3 dots

![](_img/_gcalendar/pic1.png)

2.	Click settings and sharing

![](_img/_gcalendar/pic2.png)
 
3.	Make sure to check “Make available for National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration” and select “See all event details” in the drop down.

![](_img/_gcalendar/pic3.png)

 
That should do it.
